product_name: Kokatat Gore-Tex Expedition Dry Suit - Women's
long_description: The women's Kokatat Gore-Tex(R) Expedition dry suit fends off tough weather and rough waters to keep you warm and dry. Tough nylon with Gore-Tex Pro Shell laminate is completely waterproof, extremely breathable and highly durable. Tough reinforcements at knees and seat boost abrasion resistance and durability; fabric patches on exterior of Gore-Tex are self-draining. Neoprene neck gasket seals with skin to help keep water out. Stowable storm hood features adjustable drawstring and reflective tape; hood is designed to work with a paddling helmet. Adjustable neoprene band keeps suit snugly fitted around midsection using 2 large rip-and-stick tabs. Specialized sleeves enhance freedom of motion and won't restrict movement when paddling. Sleeve pockets on left and right arms store small essentials. Waterproof front-entry zipper eases dressing and zippered, drop-away seat makes pit stops quick and easy. Adjustable leg and arm cuffs with rip-and-stick closures dial in the fit; arm cuffs have latex gaskets to enhance protection. Reflective highlights on front of suit enhance visibility in low light. Integrated Gore-Tex socks are more comfortable than latex gaskets and prevent water from entering suit at legs. The Kokatat Gore-Tex Expedition dry suit is built for mild surface immersion; not intended to replace a full dry suit in more challenging conditions such as very cold water. Machine or hand wash in cold water with powdered detergent; do not bleach or dry clean; store dry, hanging or loosely folded.
short_description: The women's Kokatat Gore-Tex(R) Expedition dry suit fends off tough weather and rough waters to keep you warm and dry.
